author: Al Jazeera
title: In Pictures: Orthodox Christians observe Easter amid lockdown
description: More than 260 million people mark Easter Sunday, with worshippers asked to stay at home to avoid coronovirus spread.
content:
More than 260 million Orthodox Christians celebrated Easter Sunday, with church leaders urging worshippers to stay at home to avoid spreading the novel coronavirus.
